title: Syria Assessment Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard showing all assessments in Syria from 2013. Useful for secondary research and planning.

title: Syria 3W Dashboard
description: Interactive 3W Syria Dashboard. Useful for coordination and planning.

title: SIMS Scenario Mapping Tool
description: Scenario mapping tool in Word format. Useful for situational analysis and planning. Produced by SIMS.

title: SIMS Situational Analysis and Recommendations Report Template
description: Situational analysis tool in Word format. Useful for situational analysis and planning. Produced by SIMS.

title: Guidedance for Emergency Plan of Action
description: Emergency guidance for DREFs, EAs, and other funding mechanisms.

title: 50 Humanitarian IM Tips
description: 50 Humanitarian IM Tips created by British Red Cross' Simon Johnson. Very useful IM resource.
